header.title: Tubly: Your Youtube Videos Summary Assistant
header.description: Summarize Youtube videos with the power of IA. Get translated summarizations. Listen to audio summaries. Keep updated and save time!

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.welcome: Welcome to our app. By using our app, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

usageLimits.title: 1. Usage Limits
usageLimits.description: Free users can summarize up to thirty 30-minute videos per month. The monthly credits are not cumulative. Subscribers ($5/month) can summarize indefinitely and receive audio summaries.

payments.title: 2. Payments
payments.description: Payments are processed securely via credit card. The subscription fee is non-refundable.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: The app's functionality may use YouTube links, but we do not claim any ownership over the content found in those links.

changes.title: 4. Changes
changes.description: We may modify these terms at any time. It's your responsibility to review the terms periodically.

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions, contact us at support@mail.tubly.app

dataHandlingAndPrivacy.title: 6. Data Handling and Privacy
dataHandlingAndPrivacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our practices.

liabilityLimitation.title: 7. Liability Limitation
liabilityLimitation.description: To the extent permitted by law, we're not liable for any indirect or consequential losses.

governingLawAndJurisdiction.title: 8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLawAndJurisdiction.description: These terms are governed by the laws of Brazil. Disputes will be resolved in Brazil.

subscriptionCancellation.title: 9. Subscription Cancellation
subscriptionCancellation.description: You can cancel your subscription at any time, but no refunds will be issued for any unused portion of the subscription term.

customerSupport.title: 10. Customer Support
customerSupport.description: For any issues or inquiries, contact our customer support at support@mail.tubly.app.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Welcome to Tubly! We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal information you share with us. This privacy policy applies to your use of the Tubly app, which offers transcript summarization, audio file creation, translation services, and more.

infoCollection.title: 1. Information Collection and Use
infoCollection.description: When you use Tubly, we collect the following information via Google OAuth: - your Google ID, - email address, - name, - profile picture, and locale, to manage your account and provide our services.

dataStorage.title: 2. Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.description: Your data is stored securely on AWS servers and is protected with TLS encryption and stringent security policies. We take all reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

dataSharing.title: 3. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except as required by law or to provide you with services. We use Google Analytics for tracking page views and user sessions, which does not involve processing your personal data.

userRights.title: 4. User Rights and Choices
userRights.description: You can unsubscribe from our service at any time. You also have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. Please contact us at privacy@mail.tubly.app for assistance.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: Currently, Tubly does not use cookies or similar tracking technologies.

childrenPrivacy.title: 6. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.description: Our app is not intended for users under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

internationalTransfers.title: 7. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on computers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those of your jurisdiction.

policyChanges.title: 8. Changes to the Privacy Policy
policyChanges.description: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. Previous versions will be archived for your reference.

contactInfo.title: 9. Contact Information
contactInfo.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@mail.tubly.app.

governingLaw.title: 10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.description: regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from or related to the use of our app will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Brazil.

complianceWithLaws.title: 11. Compliance with Laws
complianceWithLaws.description: We comply with applicable laws, regulations, and guidelines regarding data protection and privacy, including GDPR and CCPA.

hero.title: Discover Tubly: AI-Powered Summaries and Audio for YouTube on Android
hero.paragraph_1: Experience Tubly, the smart Android app revolutionizing how you consume YouTube content. With advanced AI, Tubly condenses long videos into concise summaries, offering both reading and listening options.
hero.paragraph_2: Ideal for busy lifestyles, it lets you stay updated on the go. Immerse in knowledge and boost productivity with Tubly's dual visual and auditory features.
hero.paragraph_3: Download now for a smarter, more efficient video experience!
hero.phone_description: Watch less, learn more. Youtube videos summarized with the power of AI!

features.title: All the features you need
features.subtitle: Understand video contents in seconds
features.description: Maximize your efficiency with Tubly! Access knowledge quickly, improve productivity, and find valuable insights with ease.

feature_time.title: Time Tagging
feature_time.description: Navigate through videos intelligently with Tubly. Access important parts of videos with a click, using our interactive time stamps.

feature_openai.title: Powered by ChatGPT & OpenAI
feature_openai.description: Tubly utilizes the advanced technology of OpenAI and ChatGPT to transform long YouTube videos into quick and clear summaries.

feature_history.title: Your History in Tubly
feature_history.description: Revisit your favorite summaries with Tubly History. Easily access past content and never lose the insights you discovered.

feature_translation.title: Tubly Multilingual Translation
feature_translation.description: Discover videos in any language with Tubly. Watch in one language and get summaries and audios in another. Ideal for language learning and easy access to global content.

feature_audio.title: Tubly Audio Summaries
feature_audio.description: Listen to the key points of videos with Tubly's audio summaries. Ideal for mobile learning or for absorbing content while relaxing. Activate with a tap and dive into knowledge.
